org.icepdf.core.util

Class HexDumper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.icepdf.core.util.HexDumper

  • public class HexDumper
extends Object
    Utility class for formatting byte[] data in the nicely organized hex dump format. In a hex dump, each byte is represented as a two-digit hexadecimal number. Each row consists of 16 bytes separated by white space. Each row is also pre appended with the memory address and post appended with the ASCII text for bytes.
